answers.answer: Hello,sounds like you could be developing diabetic neuropathy.  The best way to treat this (and to prevent otehr complications) is to get your blood sugars under really good control.  Ideally < 140 all the time, and fasting < 100 (ideally 80 - 90 range).What meds are you on?  What is your hba1c?Are you following a low carb diet?  Are you exercising?Please let us know.
